info.name: Paladin - Oath of the Endless Abyss

description.p: Oath of the Endless Abyss is a Demonic seasoning of the Oath of the Nine Hells subclass

sheet.description: Oath of the Endless Abyss is a Demonic seasoning of the Oath of the Nine Hells subclass

description.p: You gain the following oath spells at the paladin levels listed.
description.h5: Oath of the Endless Abyss Spells

description.p: When you take this oath, you gain the following two Channel Divinity options.

Abyssal Strike. As a bonus action, you imbue a weapon you are holding with the roiling fury of the abyss. The next time you make an attack roll against a creature with that weapon within the next minute, the weapon lets loose a burst of clawing shadow, and the target takes additional necrotic damage equal to 10 + your Paladin level (whether the attack hits or misses).

Terrorize. As an action, you present your holy symbol and utter a ferocious battlecry. Each Humanoid that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can’t willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can’t take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there’s nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

description.p: You radiate an aura of chaotic, cruel magic. Creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you take an additional 1d4 necrotic damage when hit by a weapon attack.
At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

sheet.description: You radiate an aura of chaotic, cruel magic. Creatures of your choice within {{demonic aura:range}} feet of you take an additional 1d4 necrotic damage when hit by a weapon attack.

description.p: You are immune to necrotic damage and the frightened condition.
In addition, you learn one Eldritch Invocation of your choice from the Warlock class. You must still meet the prerequisites to learn it (if any).
You can swap the Eldritch Invocation you gained from this feature for another by performing a 1 hour ritual. Once you perform this ritual, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.

description.p: As an action on your turn, you can cast the shapechange spell with this feature, without expending a spell slot, but the creature you shapechange into must be a Fiend (Demon).
Once you use this feature, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.
